TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Build Giraffe buildings and units faster in this city.
TEXT.French: Construit les bâtiments et unités Girafes plus vite dans cette Ville.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]This free building is used to enable the building of the special Giraffeunits in all your cities.

Giraffe units are good for combat in Savanna tiles and their increased Sight Range. Very good light mounted units with a generally strong skill at getting in and out quickly and doing some damage while there. Giraffes are not pushovers in a fight - those horns can straight knock a person out. There is no evidence giraffes were ever trained for warfare. The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Giraffe Trainer[COLOR_REVERT] building is part of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Technologies that might have been.
Allows Giraffe units to be built in all your cities.
TEXT.French: Permet d'entraîner des unités avec Girafes dans toutes vos Villes.

TEXT.English: There is no evidence giraffe were ever trained for warfare. The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Giraffe Trainer[COLOR_REVERT] building is part of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Technologies that might have been.
TEXT.Italian: Non ci sono prove che le giraffe siano mai state usate in guerra. L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Allevatore di giraffe[COLOR_REVERT] fa parte delle [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Tecnologie che potrebbero essere esistite.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Giraffe Trainer[COLOR_REVERT] is required to train [LINK=UNIT_GIRAFFE_ARCHER]Giraffe Archers[\LINK].
TEXT.Italian: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Allevatore di giraffe[COLOR_REVERT] è necessario per addestrare [LINK=UNIT_GIRAFFE_ARCHER]Arcieri su giraffe[\LINK].

TEXT.English: There is no evidence this unit was ever used. It is part of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Technologies that might have been.
TEXT.Italian: Non c'è alcuna prova che quest'unità sia mai stata usata in battaglia. Fa parte delle [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Tecnologie che potrebbero essere esistite.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Giraffe Archer[COLOR_REVERT] is similar to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archer[COLOR_REVERT] but better against archers, with a bonus to hills and city defense and savanna terrain combat.
